entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:46 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 12:02 AM NST Friday 27 January 2023
